text: Russell Ferguson McLeod (July 29, 1906 - April 1977) was a NFL Offensive lineman. He played 3 games for the Cincinnati Reds and St. Louis Gunners. He was born in Cypress River, Manitoba, Canada. ==External links== *Database Football *Russ McLeod's profile at NFL.com Category:1906 births Category:1977 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Manitoba Category:Saint Louis University alumni Category:American football offensive linemen Category:Canadian players of American football Category:Cincinnati Reds (NFL) players Category:St. Louis Gunners players
title: Russ McLeod
